entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom I feel very down and sad Mr. Newsom.  What happened with your determination to protect California.  It feels like a betrayal from you.  Why you changed your mind? The reality is that Coronavirus is greatly increasing in California.
